abilities.name: Phantom Winds
abilities.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), if this Pokémon is on your Bench, you may shuffle it and all cards attached to it into your deck.

attacks.name: Cure Stream
attacks.effect: During your opponent's next turn, the Defending Pokémon's attacks do 30 less damage (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Brinicles-GX
attacks.effect: Switch this Pokémon with 1 of your Benched Pokémon. (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)
